p: Currently ncRNAs can be defined by length – small 18–200 nts and long >200nts – or functionality with housekeeping ncRNAs such as ribosomal RNAs (rRNAs) and transfer RNAs (tRNAs) or regulatory ncRNAs like microRNAs (miRNAs), small nuclear RNAs (snRNAs), piwi-interacting RNA (piRNAs), tRNA derived small RNAs (tsRNAs) and long non-coding RNAs (lncRNAs) ( Dozmorov et al., 2013). Nonetheless, difficulty distinguishing categories persists due to the crossover of properties.
